law.text: All disabled persons vehicles shall be in compliance with the provisions of 49 C.F.R. pt. 38 and this chapter. A carrier operating under a disabled persons vehicle certificate may provide service to any person not requiring the use of the specialized equipment. A person requiring the use of specialized equipment may be accompanied by a companion.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 7, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 607, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1996.
